amendment.description: An amendment to strike the paragraph regarding funding for Operating Expenses for National and Community Service Programs in the Corporation for National and Community Service and inserting in lieu thereof new text providing for an appropriation of $533,700,00 for the program.

action.text: Mr. Walsh raised a point of order against the Farr amendment (A014). Mr. Walsh stated that the amendment sought to provide new budget authority in excess of the relevant allocation and as such, violated the Budget Act. The Chair sustained the point of order.
